metadata.title: CVE-2024-28831 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Stored XSS in some confirmation pop-ups in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p7and 2.2.0p28 allows Checkmk users to execute arbitrary scripts by injectingHTML elements into some user input fields that are shown in a confirmationpop-up.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
